fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Cast a vote that secretly counts as 4 (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will Recieve 4 random Neutral Other, Evil or Benign roles and control each one as if it were a player.
- Each role has a separate Action, Life, Attack and Defense, Kill message and Goal.
- If 2 or more roles have a contradicting goal, one will be rerolled until its fixed.
- Votes, Effects, Whispers and Lynches are not separate, if you are lynched all roles die.
- Each time you are attacked or investigated, a random role will be targeted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Win with at least 2 of the 4 roles.
